mapper.sql: id, agreement_code, cust_id, cust_name, business_type, business_value, treaty_type, treaty_name, begin_date, end_date, validity_period, is_extended, postponed_type, treaty_copy, treaty_remark, user_id, user, depart_id, depart_name, files_num, is_default, is_files, files_code, files_user, files_dtm, f_level, f_step, check_state_flag, flow_instance_id, quotation_id, tenant_code, remark, is_deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time
mapper.update: UPDATE crm_customer_agreement SET is_deleted = 1 ,update_by = #{username}, update_time = now() WHERE id = ${id} AND is_deleted = 0
